snippet: Sandy Alderson’s No. 1 need seems to be finding a veteran pitcher for the team’s rotation who is not very expensive, but said he would be hesitant to give a free agent a multiyear deal.
abstract: New York Mets general manager Sandy Alderson’s No. 1 need seems to be finding a veteran pitcher for the team’s rotation who is not very expensive; Alderson says he would be hesitant to give a free agent a multiyear deal.
lead_paragraph: Sandy Alderson’s No. 1 need seems to be finding a veteran pitcher for the team’s rotation who is not very expensive, but said he would be hesitant to give a free agent a multiyear deal.

headline.main: Alderson Considers Best Way to Flesh Out Mets’ Rotation
headline.print_headline: Alderson Considers Best Way To Flesh Out Mets’ Rotation
